Class.ClassComment: StoreResources /** * This interface allow StoreFunc to specify resources needed in distributed cache. The resources can be on dfs (getCacheFiles) or locally (getShipFiles) * @since Pig 0.14 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Allow a StoreFunc to specify a list of files it would like placed in the distributed cache. The default implementation returns null. * @return A list of files */

/** * Allow a StoreFunc to specify a list of files located locally and would like to ship to backend (through distributed cache). Check for {@link FuncUtils} for utility function to facilitate itThe default implementation returns null. * @return A list of files */
